ViewLayer.Screens.InGameScr

Class CarInGameDisplayLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • ViewLayer.Screens.InGameScr.CarInGameDisplayLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class CarInGameDisplayLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    Builds on a JLabel to display images of a car (in different angles) on the screen. Acts as the view layer of the car representation. Works together with the Car class in the model layer. Represents one car/player in the game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • _CarImages

        private java.awt.Image[] _CarImages
        An array of images of a car with different angles.

      • _CrashedCarImage

        private java.awt.Image _CrashedCarImage
        Image of a crashed car. Used when two cars collide with each other.

      • _CurrentCarImage

        private int _CurrentCarImage
        Index of the currently used car image from the _CarImages array.

      • _CurrentIcon

        private javax.swing.ImageIcon _CurrentIcon
        Currently used Image. (same as retrieving the Image with _CurrentCarImage index from the _CarImages array)

      • _CarLogic

        private Car _CarLogic
        The model layer representation of the car. This calculates the next location/position of this JLabel.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarInGameDisplayLabel

        public CarInGameDisplayLabel(Player player)
        Builds on a JLabel to display images of a car (in different angles) on the screen. Acts as the view layer of the car representation. Works together with the Car class in the model layer. Represents one car/player in the game.
        Parameters:
        player - The player object this car belongs to.

    • Method Detail

      • ShutDown

        public void ShutDown()
        Dereference image objects. This is called before the object gets destroyed/dereferenced.

      • GetCarImages

        private void GetCarImages()
        Asks the model layer car object to provide the car image files from the disk.

      • ControlKeyPressed

        public void ControlKeyPressed(int keyCode)
        Called when one of the control keys are pressed. The pressing information passed to the model layer car object to be handled.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The keycode of the pressed key.

      • ControlKeyReleased

        public void ControlKeyReleased(int keyCode)
        Called when one of the control keys are released from pressing. The releasing information passed to the model layer car object to be handled.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The keycode of the released key.

      • Turn

        public int Turn(boolean isLeftDirection)
        Turns the car either clockwise (right) or counter-clockwise (left)
        Parameters:
        isLeftDirection - True to turn the car counter-clockwise. False to turn it clockwise.
        Returns:
        Returns an array index of the newly used car image. This matches with the angle in SharedResources.CAR_Simulated_Angle_Values

      • GetNewCarImageIndexIfTurned

        public int GetNewCarImageIndexIfTurned(boolean isLeftDirection)
        Calculates which car image to use after a turn. Does not turn the car.
        Parameters:
        isLeftDirection - True to turn the car counter-clockwise. False to turn it clockwise.
        Returns:
        Returns an array index of the turned car. This matches with the angle in SharedResources.CAR_Simulated_Angle_Values

      • RefreshForNextFrame

        public void RefreshForNextFrame()
        Called each time the timer ticks. Asks the model layer Car object to calculate the new location/angle for the car image.

      • SetStartImage

        public void SetStartImage(int angle)
        Sets the car angle to a specific value. This is used at the start of the game.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle value to set the car to. Must be a value from the SharedResources.CAR_Simulated_Angle_Values array.

      • GetFirstCarImageForHUD

        public java.awt.Image GetFirstCarImageForHUD()
        Returns an image of the car for the Heads Up Display to be displayed. This is the car image with the angle of the first element in SharedResources.CAR_Simulated_Angle_Values array.
        Returns:
        An image of the car. This is one of the in-game car images with the same size too.

      • SetImageToCrashedCar

        public void SetImageToCrashedCar()
        Changes the current image to a crashed car image. Used when two cars a crashing into each other.
